mapper.select: SELECT u.username, r.id, r.NAME, p.component, p.title, p.path FROM t_user u JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id JOIN t_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN t_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
